items.sentence: Why don\'t you believe me when I say I\'m busy?
You really should\'ve eaten more for breakfast.
I\'m not Mary\'s boyfriend. I\'m just a friend.
I used to know a girl like that many years ago.
Tom still doesn\'t understand French very well.
Tom certainly had an interesting story to tell.
I\'m pretty sure Tom didn\'t tell me the truth.
I wish I\'d remembered to buy flowers for Mary.
I wouldn\'t be that surprised if that happened.
The only person who could\'ve done this is Tom.
Why are you so worried about what might happen?
I should\'ve told Tom why he needed to do that.
I shouldn\'t have stayed up so late last night.
I slept on a cot in Tom\'s basement last night.
Tom spends most of his free time reading books.
If you\'ve been drinking, you shouldn\'t drive.
I didn\'t realize you were allergic to peanuts.
I didn\'t really understand what was happening.
I didn\'t see you at the party the other night.
I didn\'t think Tom would want to see me again.
Tom was angry because I didn\'t agree with him.
Tom tried to open the drawer, but it was stuck.
Tom used to hang out with Mary, John and Alice.
Tom usually eats lunch in the school cafeteria.
I guess Tom didn\'t want you to know the truth.
Tom ought to be allowed to go to Mary\'s party.
They can still accomplish their goals, I think.
I\'m amazed at Tom\'s rapid progress in French.
I don\'t think that Tom was through doing that.
I don\'t think that Tom would enjoy doing that.
I don\'t think that what Tom said was accurate.
I don\'t think that you should see Tom anymore.
Tom didn\'t seem to notice that Mary was there.
I can\'t do anything to stop what\'s happening.
I\'ve been on the police force for three years.
I\'ve been thinking about this for a long time.
I\'ve decided not to go to Boston this weekend.
Tom needs to be told he\'s required to do that.
Mary claims that you stole the pearls from her.
Tom said he isn\'t planning on buying anything.
Are you telling me Tom is the one who did that?
As it stands now, we have to work this weekend.
Can you see the ocean from your bedroom window?
The woman over there holding a baby is my wife.
There is an urgent need for experienced pilots.
Just tell me what you know about the situation.
Let me show you around the town this afternoon.
Like it or not, you have to take this medicine.
No one knew my real name when I was in college.
